articles.title: Root takes brilliant diving catch to remove Rashid
articles.description: Watch as England's Joe Root takes a brilliant diving catch on the boundary to remove Afghanistan's Rashid Khan for 23 at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.content:

articles.title: England fight back with two wickets in two balls
articles.description: England pick up two Afghanistan wickets in two balls as Rahmat Shah is stumped by Jos Buttler for three, before Rahmanullah Gurbaz is run out for 80 at the Cricket World Cup.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
